description.value:
Element earth; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0
Prerequisite metal blast

You have used your power over metal to add clockwork components to your own body. So long as these clockwork components are kept wound (per the winding ability of the clockwork subtype), you gain the benefits of both the @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative} and @Compendium[pf1.feats.0bZf3SDkvVOe2ujH]{Lightning Reflexes} feats.
